sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Delete QrCode (we don't want to store all DGC data)
Get Validity dates based on DGC rules
Pass the scanned QrCode string to the validation API
Delete QrCode (we don't want to store all DGC data) and report signature is Invalid
Log a valid DGC for the user
Log a valid DGC for the user
Log an invalid DGC for the user
Log a valid DGC for the user

sys_hub_flow_logic.comment: Test if vaccination date is before maximum days allowed (partial or complete)
API responded DGC digital signature and integrity are ok
Test if Covid Test is negative and within maximum days allowed
Test if DGC of type Recovery and not expired
